Making $(thing)cheese$() in Firmalife is: 在Firmalife中制造$(thing)奶酪$()要稍微复杂一点. 一共有两种奶: $(thing)牦牛奶$()和$(thing)山羊奶$(). 给$(l:mechanics/animal_husbandry#yak)牦牛$()和$(l:mechanics/animal_husbandry#goat)山羊$()挤奶可以得到它们. 当然, 给$(l:mechanics/animal_husbandry#cow)奶牛$()挤奶仍然可以获得传统的牛奶.
Like usual, milk must be $(thing)curdled: 牛奶首先要用$(thing)凝乳酶$()制成$(thing)凝固的牛奶$(). 凝乳酶可以从$(thing)反刍$()动物的胃获得. 这些动物包括$(l:mechanics/animal_husbandry#yak)牦牛$(), $(l:mechanics/animal_husbandry#cow)奶牛$(), $(l:mechanics/animal_husbandry#sheep)绵羊$(), $(l:mechanics/animal_husbandry#goat)山羊$(), 和$(l:mechanics/animal_husbandry#musk_ox)麝牛$(). 把牛奶和凝乳酶一起密封在$(l:mechanics/barrels)大桶$()4小时就可以凝固.
Curdled milk must be converted to $(thin: 凝固的牛奶和$(thing)奶酪布$()一起密封在大桶中就可以制成$(thing)凝乳$(). 奶酪布是不能重复使用的.
You are ready to make $(thing)Dry Cheese: 现在你可以制造$(thing)干奶酪$()了. 你可以用$(thing)牦牛奶凝乳$()制作$(thing)Rajya Metok奶酪$(), 可以用$(thing)山羊奶凝乳$()制作$(thing)Chevre奶酪$(), 以及用$(thing)牛奶凝乳$()制造$(thing)Cheddar奶酪$().
Your other option is to make $(thing)Wet: 你也可以选择制作$(thing)湿奶酪$(). 把凝乳密封在装有$(thing)咸水$()的大桶中即可. 你可以用$(thing)牦牛奶凝乳$()制作$(thing)Shosha奶酪$(), 可以用$(thing)山羊奶凝乳$()制作$(thing)Feta奶酪$(), 以及用$(thing)牛奶凝乳$()制造$(thing)Gouda奶酪$().
Cheese wheels are blocks that should be: 奶酪轮应该以方块形式被放置储存. 为了提高它的风味和保质期, 奶酪轮最好是放在$(l:firmalife:firmalife/cellar)地窖$()里$(thing)老化$(), 正如窖藏白酒那样. 如果要从奶酪轮上获得可食用的奶酪, 手持$(thing)刀$()并且按$(item)$(k:key.use)$()就可以切一片下来. 如果直接打碎这个奶酪轮方块, 那么陈年奶酪的效果就消失了!
The aging stages of a wheel of Gouda: $(: Gouda奶酪轮的老化顺序: $(thing)新鲜$(), $(thing)老化$(), 以及$(thing)Vintage$().
The $(thing)Climate Station$() is a bloc: $(thing)气象站$()是用来管理$(l:firmalife:firmalife/greenhouse)温室$()和$(l:firmalife:firmalife/cellar)地窖$()的方块. 如果温室或地窖的多方块结构被正确的建造完成, 它就会在方块侧面显示水. 如果建造的不正确, 就会显示冰. 气象站必须放在多方块结构的第一层, 并且紧靠着墙.
The climate station in its valid and inv: 处于有效和无效状态的气象站.
$(li)It updates periodically on its own,: $(li)它每间隔一段时间都会自动更新.$()$(li)当气象站更新时, 它会触发结构中的所有其他方块发生更新. 例如, 它会让$(l:firmalife:firmalife/cheese)奶酪$()开始老化.$()$(li)按$(item)$(k:key.use)$()就可以手动触发一次更新.
The $(thing)Cellar$() is a multiblock de: $(thing)地窖$()是一种被$(l:firmalife:firmalife/climate_station)气象站$()控制的多方块建筑. 建造地窖的唯一要求就是用$(thing)密封砖$()或者$(thing)密封门$()建造一个完全封闭的空间. 气象站必须放在地窖的第一层, 紧靠着墙.
This is just one of many cellars that yo: 这只是你可以建造的无数种地窖的一个例子!
$(thing)Beeswax$() is obtained from $(l:: $(thing)蜂蜡$()可以通过$(l:firmalife:firmalife/beekeeping)养蜂$()获得.$(br)地窖可以用来$(l:firmalife:firmalife/cheese#aging)老化奶酪$().
The $(thing)Greenhouse$() is a multibloc: $(thing)温室$()是一种被$(l:firmalife:firmalife/climate_station)气象站$()控制的多方块建筑. 它全年都能种植农作物. 有很多种温室和温室方块可供选择, 建造一个温室是很简单的. 就像$(l:firmalife:firmalife/cellar)地窖$()一样, 温室需要用属于同种$(thing)温室类型$()的建筑方块建造一个封闭的空间. 温室的地板可以是任意固体方块.
$(thing)Greenhouse Types$() are families: 属于同一种$(thing)温室类型$()的建筑方块可以互相替换使用. 大多数的温室方块都会$(thing)老化$(). 例如, $(thing)防腐木$()材质的温室方块会慢慢变成$(thing)风化的防腐木$(). 由于这两种方块都属于同一种温室类型, 所以这种情况下温室还是能继续正常工作.
These are the $(thing)Greenhouse Types$(: 以下是所有的$(thing)温室类型$(), 并且它们可能老化变成:$(br)$(br)$(li)防腐木: 风化的 $()$(li)铜: 斑驳的, 风化的, 氧化的$()$(li)铁: 生锈的$() $(li)不锈钢 (不会老化)$()
There are four types of $(thing)Greenhou: 一共有四种$(thing)温室方块$(): 墙壁, 门, 屋檐, 屋顶. 屋檐和屋顶看起来像是楼梯和台阶. 你可以任意组合这四种方块用于建造你的温室.
An example greenhouse, in each main type: 每种类型的温室的一个范例
The next two pages contain recipes for t: 下面两页介绍了四种温室方块的合成方法. 这里仅介绍了铁质温室, 其中的铁棒可以替换成$(thing)防腐木材$(),$(thing)铜棒$(),或者$(thing)不锈钢棒$(). 关于不锈钢的信息, 请看$(l:firmalife:firmalife/stainless_steel)此页$().
There are many blocks that operate insid: 有一些方块可以在温室中工作:$(br)$(li)$(l:firmalife:firmalife/planters)种植盆$(), 用来种植农作物$()
$(thing)Planters$() are used to grow cro: $(thing)种植盆$()用来在$(l:firmalife:firmalife/greenhouse)温室$()中种植农作物. 手持$(thing)锄$()并看向种植盆, 就可以查看种植盆的状态. 在种植盆里的植物会像普通$(l:mechanics/crops)农作物$()一样消耗$(l:mechanics/fertilizers)营养$(). 种植盆需要被放置在温室中, 并且用$(l:firmalife:firmalife/climate_station)气象站$()激活. 种植盆需要有天然的太阳光才能正常工作.
Planters must be $(thing)Watered$() to g: 种植盆必须要$(thing)浇水$()才能生长. 你需要使用$(thing)喷壶$(), 它用$(thing)木桶$(), 一个装$(thing)水$()的容器, 以及$(thing)木材$()来合成. 手持喷壶按$(item)$(k:key.use)$()就可以给附近的植物浇水, 对着水源按$(item)$(k:key.use)$()就可以重新灌满水.
$(thing)Large Planters$() are the most s: $(thing)大号种植盆$()是最简单的一种种植盆. 它可以用种子种植一株农作物, 并且在农作物成熟后按$(item)$(k:key.use)$()收获.
Large Planters can grow $(thing)Green Be: 大号种植盆可以种植$(thing)绿豆$(), $(thing)西红柿$(), $(thing)甘蔗$(), $(thing)黄麻$(), and $(thing)谷物$(). 但如果要种植谷物, 你需要一个$(thing)铜$()或更高等级的温室.
$(thing)Quad Planters$() grow four indiv: $(thing)四槽种植盆$()可以一次种植四株农作物. 这些农作物都会从同一个养料池汲取营养, 并且在成熟后可以按$(item)$(k:key.use)$()来单独收获.
Quad Planters can grow $(thing)Beets$(),: 四槽种植盆可以种植$(thing)甜菜$(), $(thing)卷心菜$(), $(thing)胡萝卜$(), $(thing)大蒜$(), $(thing)洋葱$(), $(thing)马铃薯$(), 和$(thing)大豆$(). 这些农作物都可以在任意等级的温室中种植.
$(thing)Bonsai Planters$() grow small fr: $(thing)盆栽种植盆$()可以用树苗来种植小型果树. 按$(item)$(k:key.use)$()就可以收获水果.
Bonsai Planters can grow any fruit tree: 盆栽种植盆可以种植除$(thing)香蕉$()外的任何果树, 而香蕉需要$(thing)悬挂的种植盆$(). 他们都会消耗氮作为主要的营养, 并且需要$(thing)铁$()或更高等级的温室才能种植.
$(thing)Hanging Planters$() grow crops u: $(thing)悬挂的种植盆$()可以倒着种植农作物. 成熟后可以按$(item)$(k:key.use)$()收获.
Hanging Planters grow $(thing)Squash$(),: 悬挂的种植盆可以用种子种植$(thing)西葫芦$(), 以及用树苗种植$(thing)香蕉$(). 西葫芦可以在任意等级的温室种植, 但香蕉需要$(thing)铁$()或更高等级的温室. 悬挂的种植盆必须被挂在一个固体方块的下方.
$(thing)Trellis Planters$() grow berry b: $(thing)格子种植盆$()可以种植各种莓果灌木. 莓果可以按$(item)$(k:key.use)$()收获.
Trellis Planters have the unique propert: 格子种植盆有一种独特的$(thing)繁殖$()灌木的功能. 如果一个格子种植盆放在另一个的上方, 并且下面的那个种植盆有一个成熟的莓果灌木, 那么它就有可能生长到上方的种植盆里. 格子种植盆可以种植所有的莓果灌木, 但$(thing)蔓越莓灌木$()除外. 它们需要$(thing)铁$()或更高等级的温室才能正常工作. 这些灌木喜欢氮.
$(thing)Beehives$() are a place to house: $(thing)蜂箱$()是养殖蜜蜂的地方. 蜂箱里面需要有至少一个$(thing)巢脾$()让蜜蜂生活. 如果要从一个有蜂居住的蜂箱中拆除巢脾, 最好在夜晚行动, 或者在蜂箱下生一堆$(thing)篝火$(). 否则被拆家的蜜蜂就会袭击你.
Beehives know about the area in a 5 bloc: 如果蜂箱周围5个方块的半径内, 有至少10朵花. 那么空的巢脾就有可能出现$(thing)蜂王$(). 这可以从绕着巢穴飞行的蜜蜂看出来.
If a beehive has two frames with queens,: 如果一个蜂箱有两个带蜂王的巢脾, 加上一个空的巢脾, 它们就有可能$(thing)配种$()并在空的巢脾上产生一个新的蜂王. 新的蜂王会继承它的祖先的$(thing)能力$(). $(thing)能力$()是蜜蜂拥有的一些不同特点, 这决定了它们如何影响周围的环境. 这些能力有1-10的等级, 其中10是最大的.
Bees also produce $(thing)Honey$(). Usin: 蜜蜂也会生产$(thing)蜂蜜$(). 手持$(l:firmalife:firmalife/jar)空罐子$()对着有蜂蜜的蜂箱按$(item)$(k:key.use)$()就可以得到$(thing)蜂蜜罐子$(). 打开蜂蜜罐子可以得到$(thing)生蜂蜜$(), 是一种$(thing)糖$()的替代品.
Pressing $(item)$(k:key.use)$() a filled: 在物品栏有$(thing)刀$()的情况下, 手持一个满的巢脾按$(item)$(k:key.use)$()可以获得有用的$(thing)蜂蜡$(). 注意, 这个操作会杀死巢脾中的蜂王!
The most important use of beeswax is in: 蜂蜡最重要的作用是制作$(thing)防腐木材$().
$(li)Bees can help fertilize planters!$(: $(li)蜜蜂可以帮种植盆提供营养.$()$(li)注意, 用刀刮蜂脾会牺牲蜂王!$()$(li)把身体弄湿可以防止蜜蜂攻击你.$()
$(li)$(thing)Hardiness$(): Allows bees t: $(li)$(thing)愉悦度$(): 可以让蜜蜂在更低的温度下生产蜂蜜. 10级的愉悦度可以忍受-16°C的低温, 而1级的愉悦度可以忍受2°C的低温.$()$(li)$(thing)生产力$(): 提高蜂蜜生产的速度.$()$(li)$(thing)突变体$(): 提高配种时传给下一代的能力值的标准差.$().
$(li)$(thing)Fertility$(): Increases lik: $(li)$(thing)生育能力$(): 提高配种的可能性.$()$(li)$(thing)作物亲和力$(): 给农作物传递少量营养物质的可能性.$()$(li)$(thing)自然修复$(): 造成新的花或荷叶在蜂箱附近生成.$()$(li)$(thing)冷静度$(): 降低蜜蜂攻击你的可能性$().
$(thing)Jars$() are a way of storing cer: $(thing)罐子$()是储存特定物品的一种方式. 他们可以放在地面上, 最多一组四个. 他们最大的用途是无限制的储存$(l:firmalife:firmalife/beekeeping)蜂蜜$().
It all starts with an $(thing)Empty Jar$: 所有罐子都是从$(thing)空罐子$()开始. 无论罐子的内容是什么, 把它密封在装有$(thing)水$()的$(l:mechanics/barrels)大桶$()里就可以清空.
The recipes to fill and empty jars are t: The recipes to fill and empty jars are typically simple crafting recipes. Some jars cannot have their insides removed without a special recipe.$(br)$(br)One use of jars is making $(thing)Fruit Preserves$(). To do this, boil an $(thing)Empty Jar$(), a $(thing)Sweetener$(), and fresh $(thing)Fruit$().
$(li)Fruit Preserves$()$(li)Guano Jar$(): $(li)Fruit Preserves$()$(li)Guano Jar$()$(li)Honey Jar$()$(li)Rotten Compost Jar$()$(li)Compost Jar$()
$(thing)Stainless Steel$() and $(thing)C: $(thing)Stainless Steel$() and $(thing)Chromium$() are $(thing)Steel-tier$() metals added by Firmalife. They are used in the construction of $(l:firmalife:firmalife/greenhouse)Stainless Steel Greenhouses$().
Chromite is an ore that is melted to obt: Chromite is an ore that is melted to obtain Chromium. It is found in $(thing)Igneous Intrusive$() and $(thing)Metamorphic$() rocks.
The $(thing)Drying Mat$() is used to dry: The $(thing)Drying Mat$() is used to dry items. It is made with $(thing)Fruit Leaves$(), which are obtained from breaking the leaves of $(thing)Fruit Trees$().
The recipe for the drying mat.
To use the drying mat, place it out on t: To use the drying mat, place it out on the sun and add an item to it with $(item)$(k:key.use)$(). After a half day, it will be dried. If it rains, the drying process must start over.
Drying fruit is a common use of the dryi: Drying fruit is a common use of the drying mat. Dried fruit is used in some recipes, and lasts longer.
Tofu is made using a drying mat.
Cinnamon is made using a drying mat.
Wool string is used to hang items for $(: Wool string is used to hang items for $(thing)Smoking$(). To place it, just use $(item)$(k:key.use)$().
A piece of string above a firepit.
Smoking is used to preserve $(thing)Meat: Smoking is used to preserve $(thing)Meat$() and $(l:mechanics/dairy)Cheese$(). To smoke meat, it must have first been $(thing)Brined$() by sealing it in a $(thing)Barrel$() with $(thing)Brine$(). You may also salt it first. Cheese does not have this requirement.
To start the smoking process, add the it: To start the smoking process, add the item to the string above a firepit. The firepit must be within four blocks, directly underneath the string. The string should begin to generate some smoke if it is working. It is important to note that the firepit must only be burned with $(thing)Logs$(). Using something like $(thing)Peat$() will instantly give your food the $(thing)Disgusting$() trait!
The smoking process takes 8 in-game hour: The smoking process takes 8 in-game hours. Happy smoking!
$(thing)Ovens$() are a great way of cook: $(thing)Ovens$() are a great way of cooking lots of food in a way that improves their shelf life. Oven-baked food decays at 90% of the rate of regular food. Ovens are a multiblock structure consisting of a $(thing)Bottom Oven$(), $(thing)Top Oven$(), and optionally $(thing)Chimneys$(). These blocks start off as clay, and must be $(thing)Cured$() by raising their temperature to a certain amount for long enough.
The recipe for the bottom oven.
The recipe for the top oven.
The recipe for the oven chimney    .
Ovens are insulated with $(thing)Bricks$: Ovens are insulated with $(thing)Bricks$(), other oven blocks, or anything that can insulate a Forge. This means you can use stone blocks, if you want!
The $(thing)Peel$() is the only safe way: The $(thing)Peel$() is the only safe way to remove hot items from an Oven. Just $(item)$(k:key.use)$() on it while holding it to retrieve items. Otherwise, you may get burned!
The Oven first consists of the Top Oven: The Oven first consists of the Top Oven placed on top of the Bottom Oven. All sides of each oven part, besides the front face, should then be covered with Oven Insulation blocks, as covered two pages ago. You may choose to use $(thing)Oven Chimneys$() as insulation. Placing a stack of chimneys directly behind the oven causes the smoke from the oven to travel up and out of it. If you don't do this, smoke will quickly fill up your house, which is very distracting!
An example oven structure, uncured and c: An example oven structure, uncured and cured.
The Bottom Oven is used to hold fuel, wh: The Bottom Oven is used to hold fuel, which may only be logs. Press $(item)$(k:key.use)$() to add or remove them. The bottom oven is also the part of the oven which may be lit with a $(thing)Firestarter$() or other tool. It transfers heat contained in it to the top oven.
The Top Oven contains the items that are: The Top Oven contains the items that are being cooked. It will draw heat from the Bottom Oven and slowly release it over time. This means that even if your fuel runs out, your Top Oven can continue to work for a little while. Adding items to it is as simple as pressing $(item)$(k:key.use)$(). Remember to use a $(thing)Peel$() to remove the items after.
Curing Oven blocks is easy, but requires: Curing Oven blocks is easy, but requires patience. Simply start running your Bottom Oven as you would normally, and then wait. If an oven block is above 600 degrees for about 80 seconds, it will cure itself and any oven blocks around it. The curing effect will pass all the way up chimneys nearby.
To make $(thing)Bread$(), one first must: To make $(thing)Bread$(), one first must get $(thing)Yeast$(). To get your first yeast, seal $(l:firmalife:firmalife/drying)Dried Fruit$() in a Barrel of $(thing)Water$(). After three days, $(thing)Yeast Starter$() will form.$(br)From now on, your yeast can be fed by sealing Yeast Starter in a Barrel with $(thing)Flour$(). This causes it to multiply. 1 flour per 100mB of Yeast produces 600mB of Yeast. That's a good deal!
Yeast Starter, Sweetener, and Flour can: Yeast Starter, Sweetener, and Flour can be combined to make $(thing)Dough$(). Dough can be cooked like normal to produce $(thing)Bread!$().
Given a greater need for fertilization i: Given a greater need for fertilization in Firmalife, there are more options for getting $(l:mechanics/fertilizers)fertilizers$().
Thatch can be $(l:firmalife:firmalife/dr: Thatch can be $(l:firmalife:firmalife/drying)Dried$() into $(thing)Dry Grass$(), which can be used in a Composter as a brown item.
The Composter can be upgraded to an $(th: The Composter can be upgraded to an $(thing)Iron Composter$(), which works the same, except it produces compost four times as fast.
The possible fill levels of the iron com: The possible fill levels of the iron composter
The mixing bowl is a way of mixing items: The mixing bowl is a way of mixing items and fluids together in a friendly way. $(item)$(k:key.use)$() on it with a $(thing)Spoon$() to add it to the bowl, which allows it to operate.
In Firmalife, there are a number of smal: In Firmalife, there are a number of small plants you can collect and grow on your own, which have cooking properties. The easiest way to obtain these plants is with a $(thing)Seed Ball$(). To use a $(thing)Seed Ball$(), just $(item)$(k:key.use)$() to throw it, like a snowball. This will spawn $(thing)Butterfly Grass$() in the area.
The recipe for the seed ball requires $(: The recipe for the seed ball requires $(l:firmalife:firmalife/more_fertilizer)Compost$() and 4 $(thing)Seeds$().
Butterfly grass will mature over time. W: Butterfly grass will mature over time. When one reaches maturity, it has a chance to spread to surrounding blocks, or turn into something new. Butterfly grass blocks that have been spread by another grass block do not spread anymore.
Basil is one of the plants that can be s: Basil is one of the plants that can be spawned by butterfly grass.
Basil leaves are used in pizza.
